Function Documentation

uint16 BWVersion::majorNumber (  ) 

This method returns the major version number.

uint16 BWVersion::minorNumber (  ) 

This method returns the minor version number.

uint16 BWVersion::patchNumber (  ) 

This method returns the patch version number.

This is the number of the highest patch that has been applied.

A string representing the version.
